bug.author: prabindh
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/nn/batch_normalization>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r2.0/api_docs/python/tf/nn/batch_normalization</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
Documentation <denchmark-h:h3>Clear description</denchmark-h>
Yes <denchmark-h:h3>Correct links</denchmark-h>
Yes Is the link to the source code correct? Yes <denchmark-h:h3>Parameters defined</denchmark-h>
Yes Are all parameters defined and formatted correctly? No.
tf.nn.moments(..., keep_dims=True)
In TF2 version of tf.nn.moments, keep_dims keyword should be "keepdims" instead
Does not implement the equation as given, but the equation 11 in Algorithm 2 of the paper.
<denchmark-h:h3>Returns defined</denchmark-h>
Are return values defined? Yes <denchmark-h:h3>Raises listed and defined</denchmark-h>
No <denchmark-h:h3>Usage example</denchmark-h>
Is there a usage example? No <denchmark-h:h3>Request visuals, if applicable</denchmark-h>
No Are there currently visuals? If not, will it clarify the content? No <denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
Yes Are you planning to also submit a pull request to fix the issue? See the docs contributor guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs</denchmark-link> and the docs style guide: <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs_style>https://www.tensorflow.org/community/contribute/docs_style</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Closing this issue since the associated PR has been merged. Thanks!
